combat.title: DRIVEN ONWARDS
combat.general: Your opponent to reroll 2 dice of his choice.
combat.unit: Bastion/Sister Repentia/Light Cruiser: Gain 1 (S) for each [B] rolled while resolving the general ability of this card.

combat.title: BEACON OF FAITH
combat.unit:
Sister Repentia: Replace 1 of your Sisters Repentia on this world with 1 free Battle Sister in this area and gain 2 [D]. 
 - or - 
 Bastion/Light Cruiser: Gain 1 [M] and 2 (S).

combat.title: GUIDED RETRIBUTION
combat.general:
Bastion/Sister Repentia/Light Cruisers: Gain 1 (B) or 1 (S). 

 Play 1 combat card from your hand. Then discard this card.

combat.title: HOLY TRINITY
combat.general:
If this card gets discarded gain 2 (B). 

 Gain 2 [B].
combat.unit: Battle Sister/Bastion: Gain 2 (B). During the assess damage step of this execution round, you force your opponent to assign damage to his units 1 at a time.

combat.title: SANCTIFIED  CHARGE
combat.general:
Gain 2 [D]. 

 Reroll 1 die of your choice.
combat.unit: Sister Repentia/Light Cruiser: Gain 1 (B) for every [B], 1 (S) for every [S] and 1 [D] for every [M] rolled while resolving the general ability of this card.

combat.title: ZEALOTS PASSION
combat.general:
Force your opponent to lose 1 [M]. 

 Gain 1 (B) or discard 1 card from your hand.
combat.unit:
Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: If you are attacking your opponent may not place reinforcement tokens in this area or rally units this execution round. 
 If you are defending, rally 1 of your units.

combat.title: MARTYRDOM
combat.general: Convert up to 2 of your [B] into [M].
combat.unit: Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: Choose 1 of your unrouted units. That unit suffers damage first during this execution round. Damage in excess of the chosen unit health value is lost.

combat.title: SPIRITUAL FORTITUDE
combat.general:
If you are defending, force your opponent to lose 2 (B). 

 Force your oppononent to spend either 1 [B] or 1 [M].

combat.title: ANGELIC DESCENT
combat.general: Gain 1 (S) for each of your unrouted units, up to 3.
combat.unit: Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: After assign damage phase your opponent chooses and destroys 1 of his routed units unless he spends 1 [B].

combat.title: MARTYR'S IMMOLATION
combat.general: Gain 2 (S) unless your opponent allows to discard 1 random combat card from his hand. If he does, gain 1 [M] instead.
combat.unit:
Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: Spend 1 [S] to gain 2 (B). 
 - or - 
 Exorcist/Grand Cruiser: You may choose that Exorcist Tank or Vengeance Grand Cruiser suffers damage first during this execution round to gain 3 (B).

combat.title: ARMOURED IN FAITH
combat.unit:
Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: Rally 1 of your units. 
 - or - 
 Exorcist/Grand Cruiser: If you have more [M] than your opponent, force your opponent to route 1 unit unless he spends [M].

combat.title: DEVASTATING REFRAIN
combat.general:
If this card gets discarded you may resolve its ability. 

 Convert up to 3 of your dice into 1 [B] or 1 [S]. Gain 1 (B) for each [M] converted.

combat.title: DIVINE BLESSING
combat.general: Spend any number of [S] and [M]. For die spent, force your opponent to lose 1 [B].

combat.title: DIVINE SMITING
combat.general: Your opponent chooses and discards 1 of his faceup cards.
combat.unit: Living Saint/Grand Cruiser: Take top card from your combat deck and play it. Do not resolve its abilities but gain its combat icons during this combat.

orders.title: FAITHFUL ADVANCE
orders.general:
While resolving this order, you may move up to 2 of your units trough uncontrolled planets as if it were a friendly area. 
 LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

orders.title: DIVINE DELIVERANCE
orders.general:
If a world is contested as a result of this order, gain 1 [D] for each Sister Repentina at the reinforcement phase. 
 LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

orders.title: LEAD THE RIGHTEOUS
orders.general:
After you resolve this order you may rally all units in active system or in any one adjacent system. 
 LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

orders.title: WAR HYMNS
orders.general:
If the sum of morale of units participating in this order is bigger than sum of morale of all units and structures on the enemy world, force your opponent to rout 1 unit. Spend 1 [S] to force routed unit to retreat from this planet. 
 LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

orders.title: BRAZIER OF HOLY FIRE
orders.general:
Bastions do not prevent this strike. Rout any number of your participating units to convert 2 dice into [B] for every routed unit. 
 LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

events.title: UNDIVIDED FAITH
events.general:
Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. 

 You may discard this card at the end of the last execution round of combat. If you do, your routed units provide half of their morale value, rounded up.

events.title: HEROINE IN THE MAKING
events.general:
Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. 

 You may discard this scheme instead of reveling an order. If you do you may resolve advance order using 1 Battle Sister or 1 Sister Repentina that will start a combat with 1 execution round only. Treat your unit as s Living Saint for all purposes of the combat. Destroy this unit after battle.

events.title: INDOMITABLE BELIEF
events.general:
Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. 

 You may discard this scheme at the beginning of an execution round. If you do your units cannot be routed this round.

events.title: FAIT ACCOMPLI
events.general:
Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. 

 Instead of revealing an order during the Operations Phase, take 1 Sister Repentina or 1 Battle Sister from any world and place it on a friendly world.

events.title: INVASION CATHEDRUM DEPLOYMENT
events.general: You may place 1 free Battle Sister on a world containing at least 1 of your units or place 1 free Sister Repentina on a friendly world.

events.title: CRUSADE INTO DARKNESS
events.general: You may purchase a Combat Card upgrade. You may reduce the cost of that upgrade by up to 3 materiel for every system with your and your opponent's units.

events.title: INSPIRING ORATOR
events.general: Gain 1 reinforcement token for every City you control.

events.title: ULTIMATE DEVOTION
events.general: Select system with one of your structures, and place 1 Endurance Light Cruiser on a friendly or uncontrolled void in that system.
